title: trying to reconnect prob
body: i did this once already but this is so annoying that i cant play whenevert i want because i cant see accept and its the 2309523 time that i get banned for 30 min timme after time plz fix this riot ive tried everything and its not my internet

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble transitionoing to champion select.  It's really important to fix that up because you can get a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty for declining too many times, such as this case.  Your internet might be fine, but you can have issues reaching specific services.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.  Let me know if you have any questions on this.

I have a problem connecting to a game from champ select. The majority of my games when champ select ends and the game is supposed to load, I fail to get into loading screen and I can't get in the loading screen until the game starts. Needless to say it's not enjoyable when the majority of my games I get to connect into the game late.
